text: General elections were held in the Netherlands on 16 June 1905.Dieter Nohlen & Philip Stöver (2010) Elections in Europe: A data handbook, p1395 The Liberal Union remained the largest party, winning 34 of the 100 seats in the House of Representatives.Nohlen & Stöver, p1412 ==Results== ==References== Category:General elections in the Netherlands Netherlands Category:1905 in the Netherlands Category:Election and referendum articles with incomplete results
title: 1905 Dutch general election
